treatment-md.title: Hymenocephalus fuscus Mcmillan & Iwamoto, 2014, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Descriptions of four species of grenadier fishes of the genera Hymenocephalus and Hymenogadus (Teleostei, Gadiformes, Macrouridae) from the New Zealand region and Tasman Sea, including two new species of Hymenocephalus
